text: Kwa anthu a ku Midiyani tidatumiza m’bale wawo Shaibu. Iye anati: “Oh anthu anga! Pembedzani Mulungu, inu mulibe mulungu wina koma Iye yekha. Ndithudi chizindikiro chooneka chadza kwa inu kuchokera kwa Ambuye wanu motero perekani muyeso woyenera ndipo yesani zonse moyenera ndipo musachite chinyengo kwa anthu pa katundu wawo ndipo musawononge dziko lapansi pambuyo poti layeretsedwa kale. Chimenecho ndicho chinthu chabwino kwa inu ngati inu ndinu okhulupirira kwenikweni.”
